Darren Wong Weblog | About | Timeline

About

Greetings, my name is Darren. I design and develop for screens and things. I currently work on inkling.com designing extensible patterns and code to tell our story and engage our visitors.

I was born and raised on the island of O’ahu, Hawai’i and I currently live in foggy San Francisco.

I’m really into side projects. I think it’s important to do something purely for passion and funz, it helps us get away from the things we have to do and replace them with the things we want to do.

Current Side Project: Smoked Meat Saturdays where a buddy and I host small get togethers for friends; we eat, drink and be merry.

I listen to a lot of Drake, he’s the song bird of our generation. I watch a lot of Wes Anderson movies, my favorite movie of his is Moonrise Kingdom.

Have any questions? tweet me @darrendub or you can reach me by electronic mail. You can also find my pixels on dribbble and my code on github.

This site is built with Jekyll in a flavor of Poole and hosted on GitHub. Set in Fira Sans and Vollkorn. Hand typed by Darren Wong in San Francisco.
